meanings.sent1: She carefully unnailing the old wooden boards from the wall.
meanings.sent2: He unnailing the picture frame to repaint it.
meanings.sent3: The carpenter joked that he was unnailing the wall to set the nails free.
meanings.sent4: The idea of unnailing the truth from the lies was daunting.
meanings.sent5: The sound of unnailing echoed through the room, signaling the start of renovation.

meanings.definition: To release or free from being nailed
meanings.sent1: The rescue team unnailing the trapped bird from the fence.
meanings.sent2: She unnailing the stuck drawer to retrieve her favorite pen.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved unnailing the volunteer from the wooden box.
meanings.sent4: Her words unnailing the sadness that had been weighing on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The key to happiness is unnailing yourself from self-doubt and fear.

meanings.sent1: The unnailing of the old roof was a time-consuming task.
meanings.sent2: He collected the nails after the unnailing to reuse them in another project.
meanings.sent3: The unnailing of the fence revealed a hidden garden behind it.
meanings.sent4: The unnailing of the door symbolized the end of one chapter and the beginning of another.
meanings.sent5: The unnailing of the ship's deck brought a sense of renewal to the crew.
